ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui
Class IODialog

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui.IODialog

public class IODialog
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to handle open/save dialogs. Primarily, this class has been designed to be able to switch easily between Swing and AWT dialogs. If the GUI of GNW makes use of Swing in order to have the same GUI on all platforms, the possibility to release GNW as a Mac application is studying because Mac offer nice features to its applications such as drag&drop files on the application icon to open them. What was intended with the implementation of this class was to benefit from the nice, native open/save Mac dialogs.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)
